subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: A devastating scratch at 2014’s Kentucky Derby was followed by a run of luck that led to American Pharoah’s Triple Crown victory, another racer’s successful return and the arrival of an unexpected bundle of joy.
snippet: A devastating scratch at 2014’s Kentucky Derby was followed by a run of luck that led to American Pharoah’s Triple Crown victory, another racer’s successful return and the arrival of an unexpected bundle of joy.
